content.prompt: Which of the following was an outcome of the Columbian Exchange?

choices.label: The life expectancy of Native Americans increased.
Horses and smallpox were introduced in Europe.
Sugar and rice were introduced in Africa.

topic.text: 1.4: Columbian Exchange, Spanish Exploration, and Conquest

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
